data.message: How can I set security measures? And also where did the filters go when Im looking for people? A week ago it was possible to search people based on age, gender, school, work, city, relatives, nearly anything, and now its all gone. I cant search for anybody now just the random results that FB thinks Im looking for.

replies.message: Hey Gergő. In our Help Center, you will find 6 things you can do to help keep your account safe: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/379220725465972. We’re constantly working to improve all of our products and we're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If there is something that you'd like to see, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo Thanks! -Hailey
Awesome! Thanks guys! What about the filters? How can I look for people based on age, gender, school, work, city, relatives, just like a month ago?
